rows.label: qst001501_msg001
rows.name: Yeah, just between you and me...

rows.label: qst001501_msg002
rows.name:
The spy the Imperial Army caught the other
day apparently attached some top-secret
info to a monster and let it escape.

rows.label: qst001501_msg004
rows.name: There's a huge reward out for it.

rows.label: qst001501_msg005
rows.name:
If we catch that monster and deliver
the secret info to the guardhouse, we
can kick back and relax for a while!

rows.label: qst001501_msg006
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: qst001501_msg007
rows.name: Ask if he shouldn't be working.

rows.label: qst001501_msg008
rows.name:
Ask if he really wants
to rest that much.

rows.label: qst001501_msg009
rows.name:
The response is the
same for both choices.

rows.label: qst001501_msg010
rows.name:
A lot of mercenary work is
dangerous. Guarding important
people, hunting monsters...

rows.label: qst001501_msg011
rows.name:
That's all I ever do. It
wouldn't kill me to take a
break once in a while, would it?

rows.label: qst001501_msg012
rows.name:
So I've been looking,
but... it's a real pain.

rows.label: qst001501_msg013
rows.name:
It's mixed in with a whole flock, so
I have no idea which one has it.

rows.label: qst001501_msg014
rows.name:
If I went back to the company
and had them check, they might
find it right away, but...

rows.label: qst001501_msg015
rows.name:
then I wouldn't get to keep the
reward all to myself. Asking
for help is a last resort.

rows.label: qst001501_msg016
rows.name:
It's a tough opponent, but
I'll definitely catch it and
rake in that reward money!

rows.label: qst001501_msg017
rows.name:
Oops, I gotta hurry before
someone else beats me to it.

rows.label: qst001501_msg018
rows.name: Well, I'm off. See ya!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0002
rows.name:
Well met, fellow professional! I've
got an interesting story for you.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0003
rows.name:
A spy recently caught by the
Imperial Army hid some top-secret
information somewhere.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0004
rows.name: Now, where do you think they hid it?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0005
rows.name: Where do we think it's hidden?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0006
rows.name: Buried in the ground

rows.label: qst001501_msg0007
rows.name: Inside their stomach

rows.label: qst001501_msg0008
rows.name: In the Cloud Sea

rows.label: qst001501_msg0009
rows.name: Wrong.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0010
rows.name:
Though considering what
happened next, that might
have been more reliable...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0011
rows.name: So only a salvager could get to it, eh?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0012
rows.name: Unfortunately, you're wrong.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0013
rows.name:
The spy, lacking time to hide it properly,
put the secret documents in a small iron
box and fed them to a monster.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0014
rows.name: Surprising, isn't it?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0016
rows.name: That's it!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0017
rows.name:
Not their own stomach,
though. A monster's stomach.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0018
rows.name:
They put the secret documents
in a small iron box and, gulp!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0019
rows.name: That monster was a Noog Skeeter.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0020
rows.name:
You know how they fly so carefreely
through the Superbian skies?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0021
rows.name:
The Noog Skeeter that swallowed the
information has mixed in with its flock,
and now we can't tell which one it is.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0022
rows.name:
There's a large reward, but it
takes a long time to defeat even
one, so it's not worth it.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0023
rows.name:
So that's the story of a difficult
job that no one wants to take.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0025
rows.name:
Well, I won't stop you
if you want to try.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0026
rows.name:
Defeat the Noog Skeeters,
get the secret documents...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0027
rows.name:
and give them to the soldier at
the guardhouse at the entrance to
Hadashal Palace for a reward.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0029
rows.name: Oh, right...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0030
rows.name:
You might be able to tell which Noog
Skeeter swallowed the documents.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0031
rows.name:
With a foreign object in
its stomach, it's probably
not feeling too well.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0032
rows.name:
But you might have to observe
them for quite a while...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0101
rows.name: Hey, how's that job coming along?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0102
rows.name:
Defeat the Noog Skeeters,
get the secret documents...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0103
rows.name:
and give them to the soldier at
the guardhouse at the entrance to
Hadashal Palace for a reward.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0104
rows.name: Good luck.
